headline.main: Bus Crash Kills 18, Injures 37 in Panama
headline.print_headline: Bus Crash Kills 18, Injures 37 in Panama

lead_paragraph: A bus carrying farm workers went off a highway and ended up in a stream Sunday southwest of Panama's capital, causing 18 deaths and injuring 37 others, authorities said.
snippet: A bus carrying farm workers went off a highway and ended up in a stream Sunday southwest of Panama's capital, causing 18 deaths and injuring 37 others, authorities said....
